title: Mathematics - Expert
description: Advanced mathematics including calculus, linear algebra, and mathematical analysis

questions.question: What is the derivative of ln(x²)?
What is the limit of (sin x)/x as x approaches 0?
questions.explanation: This is a fundamental limit: lim(x→0) (sin x)/x = 1

questions.question: What is the determinant of the matrix [[2,3],[1,4]]?
What is ∫e^x dx?
questions.explanation: The integral of e^x is e^x + C, since d/dx[e^x] = e^x

questions.question: What is the Taylor series expansion of e^x around x = 0?
What is the eigenvalue equation for a matrix A?
questions.explanation: The eigenvalue equation is Av = λv, where λ is the eigenvalue and v is the eigenvector.

questions.question: What is the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus (Part 1)?
questions.explanation: Part 1 of the FTC states that d/dx ∫[a to x] f(t)dt = f(x)

questions.question: What is the divergence of the vector field F = (x², y², z²)?
What is the complex number i⁴?
What is the radius of convergence for the power series ∑(x^n)/n!?
questions.explanation: The series ∑(x^n)/n! converges for all real x, so the radius of convergence is ∞.
